tag_list: art, art-print, framed-art, canvas-art, original-art, handmade-art, abstract-art, art-consultant
overview:
About the Artist: Established artist Ricki Mountain is an illustrator, collagist, and painter who uses her creative artwork along with technology to create unique one of a kind images. Her prolific and versatile nature appeals to audiences of all ages. Ricki Mountains images are used as licensed artwork for fine art prints, and posters, giftware, tableware, wall decor, textiles, home accessories products, and much more…

Specialties:

Art Licensing Art illustration and Design Art Publishing Contract negotiation Creative direction Image acquisition Art Marketing Print on Demand artwork Print Production Product Development Wholesale art programs Trend identification Wholesale art programs
